Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Defensin D7 (So-D7; Antimicrobial peptide D7; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptide. Active against Fusarium spp., Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacterial pathogens.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Distributed in the epidermal cell layer of leaves and in the subepidermal layer region of stems. Not in roots.
Sequence Information.Developmental stage: Present throughout the life of the leaf.

Literature.Title: Novel defensin subfamily from spinach (Spinacia oleracea).
Literature.Author: Segura A, Moreno M, Molina A, Garcia-Olmedo F.
